content: There’s quite a few snowflakes on here getting triggered by the idea that people don’t mind political influence in their sports articles. The people who lean left don’t feel the need to shout and scream until someone they disagree with shuts up, which is what you see on political articles on this site without fail. “Keep it to sports” has no basis in reality, nobody needs to keep politics out of anything. Seems like the conservative snowflakes read whatever is published anyway, if only to scream about how it offends their delicate sensibilities, no matter how grounded in fact it is.
